attributes.action: Bike to the Bank / Park Organisers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are appealing for the football match between Grimsby Town and Lincoln City be moved to a traditional 3pm kick off.
This is so a charity bike event can take place, while currently it is scheduled for a 12pm, the health and safety would be called in to question.
We want to hold the event to raise £10,000 for local charities in this second event.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
